name: Tapayolli
description:
"Tapayolli : ball, round shaped thing." - Náhuatl Dictionnary

In this ancient Aztec factory, you have to bounce balls of alien energy in the right direction with your triangular artifact. Go for a high score and make no mistake or you will face the wrath of the gods !

This game was made in 72 hours for SpaceScore Jam #21.

All assets were made during the jam, by us.

Team
  • Design, Programming, Sound: Yann Dupont (Old Dry Witch Games)
  • Art : Louis Hasenfratz (turbolumasse)
Big thanks to our testers
  • Emma Neiss
  • Sebastien Goll
  • Justin Pabot
